members.member:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Executes the dynamic configuration description update. Usually performed when configuration description arrives from ROS device. Also susbscribes each parameter for updates
The description message. The DynamicReconfigure interface. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This method is reserved and should not be used. When implementing the IXmlSerializable interface, you should return null (Nothing in Visual Basic) from this method, and instead, if specifying a custom schema is required, apply the to the class.
An that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the
method and consumed by the method.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
